resources.string:
Doesn't look like you imported any config. 



You can do so from the menu options ;)
The config file wasn\'t found. Create one?
Something went wrong while reading config
Something went wrong while importing config
Always import config on app start
Run config application script on saving
My favorite accent color is that one over there ->

#############################################################################
# Copyright Pappschlumpf and xXx
# Usage without our permission not allowed!!
#
# Configuration file to allow customize the Smurf-Kernel Installation
# Generated by Smurf Config Editor made by tanish2k09
#
# Smurf kernel by XDA Senior Member @pappschlumpf
#############################################################################
#
# ----- How to Guide ------
#
# For each Option you will find multiple lines with all available values
# Simply remove the # in front of the option you want to apply
# and add # in front of all remaining options in that category
#
# The settings are ordered in this order:
# - Battery friendy (top)
# - Performance friendly (bottom)
#############################################################################
Give me all your money here:
Use titles on config card instead of value
Use pure black background instead of dark
